TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Sirakesay, title = Sirakesay, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sirakesay} }

S.FORM: Sirakesay Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Sirakesay a niyaro', 1,845 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,720 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 10 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 486 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 90 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4,234 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis8 , Truku1 . Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.
